name: Envelope
tagline: First AI agent for event planning
description: Describe your event and get a stunning registration page, invites & more – instantly. Edit details in an intuitive builder while AI does the heavy lifting. Perfect for individuals and teams who want professional events without juggling tools.

name: stackoverflow.ai
tagline: Get trusted answers, instantly
description: stackoverflow.ai is an AI-powered search and discovery tool designed to modernize the Stack Overflow experience by helping developers get answers instantly, learn along the way and provide a path into the community.

name: Sudo AI
tagline: One API for any LLM— routing, context, and monetization
description: Sudo is a unified API for LLMs — the faster, cheaper way to route across OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and more. One endpoint for lower latency, higher throughput, and lower costs than alternatives. Build smarter, scale faster, and do so with zero lock-in

name: Paste 6
tagline: Your Clipboard Reimagined in Liquid Glass
description: Paste is a smart clipboard manager for Mac and iOS devices. With this release, Paste brings a new look with Liquid Glass that makes your clipboard feel fluid, clear, and instantly familiar across devices — perfectly in step with OS 26.

name: Journalist Hunt 2.0
tagline: 100,000+ journalists to pitch and get published
description: Journalist Hunt helps you get media attention by connecting you with over 100k+ journalists in one place. Stop pitching blindly, find the right journalists who care about your story, so you can land press mentions, build authority, and grow your business fast.

name: Dreamflow 2.0
tagline: The fastest way to build mobile apps powered by Flutter
description: Prompt with AI, refine UI visually or dip into code if you want, all synced so you can switch seamlessly between them. Preview instantly, publish real apps and tap into Flutter’s speed, flexibility and sleek UI with production-ready code that’s always yours.

name: HeyGen Video Agent
tagline: Turn Your Prompt Into a Finished, Publish-Ready Video
description: Create customized videos using HeyGen's AI Video Generator, turning scripts into talking videos with customizable AI avatars in minutes, without a camera or crew.

name: Sentient Chat
tagline: A GRID experience providing open-source intelligence
description: Platform powered by the world's largest network of intelligence—GRID (Global Intelligence and Research Directory). 100+ partners integrated into Sentient Chat, so users can experience open AGI. Source code be fully open-sourced, coming soon.

name: Thirty Calendar
tagline: The best ai calendar to organize your work and life.
description: Thirty is the AI calendar that talks to you. Schedule smarter, organize faster, and focus on what matters most. Join thousands using AI to manage their life.

name: Meta Ray-Ban Display
tagline: A breakthrough category of AI glasses
description: Meta Ray-Ban Display is a new category of AI glasses featuring a private, in-lens color display. Paired with the Meta Neural Band allows for silent, intuitive control through subtle hand gestures, letting you interact with visual AI, messages, and more.

name: Tyran AI
tagline: The easiest way to apply AI to health data
description: Tyran makes it easy to create health agents on top of any health data and embed them into your product. You can easily prompt Tyran to create sleep recommendations, analyse HRV patterns, create better workouts, analyse menstruation information, and much more!

name: AP2
tagline: The open protocol for agentic commerce
description: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) is an open protocol that builds on A2A, Agent to Agent Protocol. AP2 was developed by Google with leading payments and technology companies to securely initiate and transact agent-led payments across platforms.

name: AudioJot
tagline: Privacy friendly fleeting thoughts smart diary
description: Capturing fleeting thoughts helps spark ideas, aids reflection, and helps track todos. We makes this effortless while being privacy friendly. Your notes can only be unlocked by you, audio is short-lived, and trusted AI providers are used with no identifier.

name: FlowBot
tagline: Whatsapp automation & no-code chatbot builder
description: Flowbot is a no-code platform that empowers businesses to automate their customer interactions on WhatsApp. Businesses can use Flowbot’s intuitive drag-and-drop builder to create workflows for sales, support, and marketing without writing a line of code.

name: MCP Snitch
tagline: Maintain secure control over your MCP environment
description: Real-time security monitoring for MCP tools. Protect API keys, whitelist tool calls, and maintain complete control over your MCP environment.

name: Vector
tagline: AI PM Agent for instant PRDs & user stories after meetings
description: Stop slow sprints and high code churn. Vector transforms natural-language ideas from meeting transcripts into structured PRDs, policy-aware acceptance criteria, and developer-ready work items integrating seamlessly with Jira, GitHub, and PR review bots.

name: Hoverify 4.0
tagline: All-in-one browser extension for web developers/designers
description: Supercharge your web development workflow with an all-in-one browser extension that helps you inspect, edit, test, debug, and optimize websites faster.

name: LeadSources 2.0
tagline: Map the full journey behind every lead
description: LeadSources 2.0 maps the full source and journey behind every lead from first click to lead submission.

name: Hey Menu
tagline: Understand foreign menus
description: Snap any menu to instantly translate, see nutrition facts, check allergens & dietary tags. AI search finds dishes matching your needs. 12+ languages supported. Perfect for travelers & anyone with dietary restrictions. Available on iOS & Android.

name: MindX Service AI
tagline: Your 24/7 AI agent for customer support
description: MindX Service AI is a human-grade, fully agentic AI that handles customer queries across chat and email. It auto-resolves 80% of tickets, boosts agent productivity by 20%, and delivers 24/7 support without hiring more staff.

tagline: First AI agent for event planning
